rukus.text: My sent Noah jeho zaludnit Ona warn tvoj ludia painful retribution afflicts them
He said O moj ludia ja je manifest warner do ona
Do alert ona ze ona kult GOD reverence Him obey mna
He potom forgive ona tvoj zhresit respite ona for predetermined period! vela assuredly GOD's appointment never zdrzat once it bol due ona len zauzlit
He said Moj Lord ja invited moj ludia night dni
Moj invitation len zvacsenie ich aversion
Whenever ja invited them forgiven Ona they miesto ich fingers ich ears pokryvka themselves s ich clothes insisted turned arrogant
Potom ja invited them publicly
Potom ja proclaimed them loudly ja spoke do them privately
Ja said Implore tvoj Lord forgiveness; He Forgiving
â€˜He potom lejak ona generously dazo
Zadovazit ona peniaze dieta orchards streams
Why ona nie strive should reverence GOD
He bol Jeden created ona do rezirovat
Ona nie realize lenze GOD created 7 universes do robit layers
He zamyslat moon therein bol lahky miesto sun bol lampa
GOD germinated ona zem zasadit
Potom He spatny listok ona it He iste bring ona out
GOD robit ZEM habitable ONA
Ze ona build cesta therein
